derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin ornatus 'adorned', past participle of ornare

entry.tran: 装饰华丽的；修饰繁复的
entry.def: An ornate building, piece of furniture, or object is decorated with complicated patterns or shapes.

example.ex: ...the big dining-room with its massive fireplace and ornate ceiling.

means.word_mean: 2. marked by elaborate rhetoric and elaborated with decorative details;

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不加修饰的,[文体等]朴素的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+ornate充满装饰的→不装饰的
orn装饰+ate……的→adj.华美的,充满装饰的
sub在下面+orn装饰→在下面装饰[别人]→贿赂

sentences.en: The frames on the pictures are ornate with flowers and fruit painted in gold.
sentences.cn: 照片的相框用金黄色的花朵和水果装饰得非常华丽。
